text_content.paragraph: When CHK Search opens in your browser, the Wells/Sites tab is displayed by default. This tab allows you to search for specific well and sites data. Click on each of the numbers on the Wells/Sites tab screenshot to identify each area.
On the following pages, we will discuss each of these areas in more detail.

page.prompt: CLICK EACH OF THE NUMBERS ON THE GRAPHIC TO LEARN MORE. THEN CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.

cc_text.paragraph: When CHK Search opens in your browser, the Wells/Sites tab is displayed by default. This tab allows you to search for specific well and sites data. Click on each of the numbers on the Wells/Sites tab screenshot to identify each area.

dlink.linkTxt: Select this link for a text alternative of the slideshow
